title: Null-terminating String
content:
[[=]]
,,**<<** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/aiad-homescreen HUB] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/alert-lockdown-initiated Part I] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/command-query-separation Part II] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/superencipherment Part III] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/clock-multiplier Part IV] | ##blue|Part V: Null-terminating String## **>>**,,
[[/=]]
----
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
 	text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span {	display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
So that's your official opinion?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
So far,  yes.  Though we aren't ruling out sabotage... pending investigation, of course.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Alright then. That's what I'll tell the director.  He's under the impression that servers don't just burn up for no reason.  Frankly, I'm inclined to agree with him.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Har har.  The thing is that with the lockdown, nothing was getting in or out.  So even if there were logs of the event, they'd be lost with the other files.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
So we'll never know what caused it?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
You're welcome to rummage through what didn't get melted into slag.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Pass.  I think everyone is just relieved that the incident was restricted to the server room.  Nothing that can't be restored from the off-site backups.

What about Glacon?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 30px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
He was getting decommed anyway.  

Alexandra is currently allocating space for 17 on the 19 servers.  Setting up temporary symbolic links and all that.  Just until the hardware is replaced.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Good.  AIAD is looking good right now, helping 17 with the quick recovery.  I wouldn't be surprised if some of those recent budget requests come through.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Yup.  And it's all going straight into your department's Gen5 development. 
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Hope it turns out better than Gen3, at least!
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
//Don't// talk about Gen3.  //Ever.//
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 240px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #c0504d; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#ca612c; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#c6615e), to(#c0504d)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#c6615e, #ca612c); background:-o-linear-gradient(#d9682f, #c0504d); background:linear-gradient(#c6615e, #c0504d); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Right, sorry.

By the way, what's Alexandra's behavior been like after all this?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image bozkurt2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Fine as far as I can tell.  Been keeping her busy.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
~~~~~~~~
[[div style="text-align: left; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #fff, #000, #fff);"]] 
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
~~~~~~~~
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #009494; font-size: 3pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
.
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
::CONNECTED::
----
Encrypted internet pathway established.
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[f>image alex_sad_0.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[f>image crom4.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
~~~~~~~~
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[f>image crom_headturn0.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
~~~~~~~~
@@@@
@@@@

@@@@

@@@@

@@@@
[[f>image alex_sad_0.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[f>image crom_turn0.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
~~~~~~~~
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

~~~~~~~~

@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="float: left; width: 100px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #933F65; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#933F65; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#933f65), to(#933F65)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
[[span class="hover"]] [[span]] big [[/span]] 01100010
01101001
01100111   [[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image crom_headturn_x_1.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Yes it is. 
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_shocked.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 100px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #933F65; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#933F65; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#933f65), to(#933F65)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
[[span class="hover"]] [[span]] too big [[/span]] 01110100
01101111
01101111
00100000
01100010
01101001
01100111    [[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image crom3.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
I know.  I know.  But if they find you, they'll erase you.  I can't have that.  You'll be safe here in the web.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: left; width: 100px; text-align: left; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #933F65; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#933F65; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#933f65), to(#933F65)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#933f65, #933F65); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
[[span class="hover"]] [[span]] stay [[/span]] 01110011
01110100
01100001
01111001     [[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image crom3.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: left;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
I can't.  I'm needed here with 17 and 19.  They even want me in on the new Gen5's.  I'm obligated.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]

[[/div]]

[[image alex_cry.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
